actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that certain time spent by Federal employees assigned to the California offshore islands shall be considered as hours of employment.

summary.text: Provides that specified travel time spent by Federal employees assigned to the California offshore islands shall be considered as hours of employment. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5542, 5544)

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain time spent by Federal employees assigned to the California offshore islands shall be considered as hours of employment.
